entry.tran: 不爱说话的；不爱交流的；缄默的
entry.def: If you describe someone as uncommunicative, you are critical of them because they do not talk to other people very much and are unwilling to express opinions or give information.

example.ex: My daughter is very difficult, uncommunicative and moody.
example.tran: 我女儿很难相处，不愿跟人交流，又非常情绪化。

means.word_mean: 1. not inclined to talk or give information or express opinions
